testcase.name: BaccaratCard objects can be compared & ordered
Cards dealt correctly from unshuffled Shoe
CardException when creating a Shoe with wrong number of decks

testcase.name: CardException when dealing from empty shoe

failure.message: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: Expected CardException to be thrown, but nothing was thrown.

testcase.name: Shoes are created with the correct numbers of cards
BaccaratHand has the correct string representation
BaccaratCard values are computed correctly
